comment: A very nice watchface. We asked for a darker theme and the author delivered. Now if we could get custom colors… 😉

author: Jeremy T.
comment: I wish it had white on a black background, and a weather option. Other than that, it's very nice.

author: Marcus Thomas
comment: I like the design on this. Definitely a modern take of the analog design that's much easier to quickly read than a standard analog watch. It could use a few visual improvements such as more legible text, filling the entire watch face, and user customizable colors.

reply.author: RADEFFFACTORY
reply.content: Thank you! Customizable colors are added.

title: Very nice watch face.
